data.comment: The match has started, with Palmeiras kicking-off.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 2, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Flamengo.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriel Veron.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeirasâ€™s Gabriel Veron is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Flamengo's area.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 8, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Allianz Parque.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Flamengo.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 14, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Flamengo throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 18, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Flamengo.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 20, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, Gabriel Veron for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In Sao Paulo Flamengo drive forward through Pedro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Guilherme Bala for Flamengo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Important block from the Flamengo defence as Ze Rafael fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
In the minute 32, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Guilherme Bala is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Guilherme Bala is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Gabriel Menino of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 37, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Flamengo's Guilherme Bala looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Flamengo pushes forward through Giorgian De Arrascaeta, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 41, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Patrick de Paula gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Palmeiras's area.
Gabriel Menino (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 44, In Sao Paulo, Gerson of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Allianz Parque the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ze Rafael for Palmeiras drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The first-half has ended.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a first substitution, with Raphael Veiga replacing Gabriel Menino.
Willian is replacing Gabriel Veron for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Guilherme Bala (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
Felipe Melo for Palmeiras has been booked by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima blows to start the second-half. Flamengo with the kick-off.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Patrick de Paula.
In the minute 56, Pedro levels the score at 1-1.
The home team replace Lucas Lima with Rony.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 65, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Allianz Parque, Joao Lucas has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 67, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Flamengo.
Palmeiras's Ze Rafael has been booked in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras advance rapidly upfield but Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima blows for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Richard is on a sub for Guilherme Bala for Flamengo.
The home team have replaced Ze Rafael with Bruno Henrique. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
Flamengo's Lincoln is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo are pushing forward but Lincoln's finish is wide of the goal.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 74, In Sao Paulo Palmeiras attack through Bruno Henrique. The finish is off target, however.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 76, Free kick Flamengo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Flamengo.
Palmeiras's Marcos Rocha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 79, Flamengo make their third substitution with Lazaro replacing Lincoln.
In the minute 81, Yuri de Oliveira is replacing Joao Lucas for the away team.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Bruno Henrique (Palmeiras) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Palmeiras's Willian misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Allianz Parque.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
